criteria: If oral T >98.9°F (at AM) or T >99.9°F (at PM)

treatment.step: 1.INJ P mol 2cc (150 /1 ml) im st (if t>1000 F). 100 ml(1000mg) infusion available(T.NParacip). [for children 10-15 mg/kg/dose,1.5cc/1cc im st] (for infants and small children give suppositories (T N:-Anamol), normally available as 80,125,170,250 mg; for <5 kg not recommended); Inj Dolonex (piroxicam) 2cc IM st ATD if allergic to P/L
2.Tepid sponging with luke warm water st & SOS;give IV fluids for very high fever.
3. Do BRE,ESR/CRP,URE , if infection is suspected & give Antibiotics for infection.
4. T or Syp Meftal may be given Stat for high fever.
5. Antiulcerants(especially if certain antibiotics like macrolides, NSAIDs, steroids areprovided).
6. Multivitamin tablets with Vit B complex, vit C.
7. Steam inhalation for relieving ENT congestion.
